cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription:
Ben Buurstra, technology operations lead for Kentico Gold partner BizStream, wrote a retrospective of his recent experiences with Xperience by Kentico, calling out aspects of the product that had the largest impact on him.
I think Ben's quote sums things up pretty well, "when I say it’s been a pleasure to work with, I really mean it".
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Xperience by Kentico: A Breath of Fresh Air
